metadata.name: Kakigōri Parallel Universe // Melon Soda
metadata.description:
Be transported to a parallel universe! Take your avatar on an adventure through space and time, where the real world crosses over into the Cryptosphere.

Chill out in the virtual world with delicious Melon Soda Kakigōri vibes and let your imagination run wild. This NFT is designed to pair with your NFT avatar as a background, but the possibilities are up to you.
